::::{.cr-section}

What is __Quarto__? What is __R__?

:::{#cr-quarto}
![](https://quarto.org/quarto.png)
:::

Quarto is an open-source scientific and technical publishing system. @cr-quarto

Quarto lets you author documents using plain text markdown in your favorite editor.

You can use quarto documents with R. @cr-rlogo


:::{#cr-rlogo}
![](https://www.r-project.org/Rlogo.png)
:::

R is a free software environment for statistical computing and graphics. 

R is available on Unix, MacOS, and Windows.

::::
